name: Fatui Avcı Eri - Lejyoner Su Topçusu
desc:
A soldier encased within a Fatui war machine.
Armed with equipment that can control the elements to a certain extent, their guns are capable of firing jets of water.
These skirmishers do not question if they shall live or die as they advance into nations far from home to complete advance missions and lay the groundwork for operations to come.

value.text: Fatui Skirmishers that shoot Hydro projectiles in battle. They receive some kind of <color=#ffe14b>elemental buff</color> . Perhaps using <color=#ffe14b>an element that reacts with Hydro</color> could make quick work of their buff...

dropMaterial.name: Acemi Asker Nişanı
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

dropMaterial.name: Çavuş Nişanı
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

dropMaterial.name: Subay Nişanı
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.
